name: The Maze (itch) (fedev)
description:
Waking up dizzy and confused, not knowing where you are is an unpleasant feeling. However, your main goal is clear: escape from there. But as you progress, you discover that there is a hidden backstory behind your confinement and that you are not alone. Will you be able to discover the truth and find a way to escape?

This game is the definitive version of the previous version of the game made in Godot.

CONTROLS

  • Mouse - Look
  • WASD, Arrow keys - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • E - Interact with Radio
  • Escape, Space, Enter - Skip intro

I sincerely hope you enjoy the game. If you have any feedback to give or bugs to report, please let me know in the comments. And please don't forget to rate the game, that helps me a lot! Thank you very much!
